mapper.insert: insert rank, title,gap, rank_date into movie values (#{rank},#{title},#{rankDate},#{gap}) title,seq,gap,rankDate
mapper.update: update set title = #{title} from movie where movie_seq like #{movieSeq}
mapper.delete: delete from movie where movie_seq like #{movieSeq}
mapper.select:
select movie_seq movieSeq, rank, title, rank_date rankDate, gap from movie
where title like '%${searchWord}%'
limit #{rowStart}, #{pageSize} /* rowStart 번째부터 pagesize수만큼 가져옴*/
